NL Question: Find all 'OSMRelation' nodes that have at least one 'OSMNode' member and at least one 'OSMWay' member. Return the names of these 'OSMRelation' nodes.
Cypher: MATCH (r:OSMRelation)-[:MEMBER]->(n:OSMNode) WITH r WHERE EXISTS { MATCH (r)-[:MEMBER]->(w:OSMWay) } RETURN r.name
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason: ❌ Value 'MEMBER]->(w:OSMWay)' for property 'MATCH (r)-[' not found in the NL question.
value_validation: ❌ Value 'MEMBER]->(w:OSMWay)' for property 'MATCH (r)-[' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For PointOfInterest nodes of type 'tennis', find all OSMNodes that are reachable via a ROUTE relationship with a distance greater than 20 and return the names of the PointOfInterest nodes and the node_osm_id of the OSMNode nodes.
Cypher: MATCH (p:PointOfInterest {type: 'tennis'})-[:ROUTE]->(o:OSMNode) WHERE p.name = 'pitch' WITH p, o MATCH (p)-[r:ROUTE]->(o) WHERE r.distance > 20 RETURN p.name, o.node_osm_id
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason: ❌ Value 'pitch' for property 'name' not found in the NL question.
value_validation: ❌ Value 'pitch' for property 'name' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: What are the names of all bus stops (OSMTags) that are associated with OSMNodes and have wheelchair access?
Cypher: MATCH (n:OSMNode)-[:TAGS]->(t:OSMTags) WHERE t.highway = 'bus_stop' AND t.wheelchair IS NOT NULL RETURN t.name AS BusStopName
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason: ❌ Value 'bus_stop' for property 'highway' not found in the NL question.
value_validation: ❌ Value 'bus_stop' for property 'highway' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: Find all Point of Interest nodes located within the bounding box defined by the Bounds node and return their names and types.
Cypher: MATCH (b:Bounds {minlat: '40.76430', maxlat: '40.80063', minlon: '-73.98187', maxlon: '-73.94925'}) WITH toFloat(b.minlat) AS minLat, toFloat(b.maxlat) AS maxLat, toFloat(b.minlon) AS minLon, toFloat(b.maxlon) AS maxLon MATCH (poi:PointOfInterest) WHERE poi.lat >= minLat AND poi.lat <= maxLat AND poi.lon >= minLon AND poi.lon <= maxLon RETURN poi.name, poi.type
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!

❌ Value '-73.94925' for property 'maxlon' not found in the NL question.
